description:
Lala thinks about how to get Haruna closer to Rito, but Peke tells Lala she should worry about her own relationship with Rito first. Momo, prioritizing Lala as the first wife in the Harem Plan, decides to give Lala a lecture on love using a dating sim game. That night, Lala appears while Rito is in the bath and asks him for the "special kiss" that people who love each other share...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiss: Kiss no Saki ni Aru Mono
Kiss: What Lies Beyond a Kiss
